DOC.brief_summary: This 6-month , open-label , flexible-dose study evaluate Desvenlafaxine Succinate Sustained-Release ( DVS SR ) Treatment Child Adolescent Outpatients Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) .
DOC.brief_title: A 6-Month Extension Study To The B2061032 Study To Evaluate The Safety , Tolerability , And Efficacy Of DVS SR In The Treatment Of Child And Adolescent Outpatients With MDD
DOC.criteria: Completed study B2061032 investigator 's opinion , would benefit long term treatment DVS SR Willingness ability comply schedule visit , treatment plan , procedures Requires precaution suicide Not generally healthy medical condition Poor compliance study drug study procedure participation study B2061032
